title: MOOD INDIGO Official Final Trailer (2014)

Mood Indigo is a true return to form for the Michel Gondry, exploring the surreal landscape of emotion and imagination along the lines of his classics The Science of Sleep and Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind. MOOD INDIGO Trailer A Movie directed by Michel Gondry Cast : Audrey Tautou (Amélie, Coco Before Chanel) and Romain Duris (The Beat My Heart Skipped). Release Date : In theaters July 2014 Based on the beloved novel Mood Indigo by Boris Vian.
